title: Majogari no Libercinis
original_name: 魔女狩りの現代教典〈リベルキニス〉
sinopse:
This is a world where all witches were hunted. The witches who appeared several decades ago were the subject of heresy, an existence that brings harm to people, but there is a young boy who had doubts about such common sense, Hayato Arai.

(Source: MU, edited)
